document_data.name: Sorlan
document_data.mainbody: '''Sorlan''' was a [[ghost]] in the [[Doomvault]] dungeon in [[1486 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Sorlan hated the [[Red Wizard]]s but had become crazy. If someone proved to be an enemy of the Red Wizards, Sorlan would helped them, but it was no easy task.
document_data.History: During his life, Sorlan was an [[adventurer]] who was captured by the [[Red Wizards of Thay]] and transported to the Doomvault dungeon where he was subjected to horrible experiments until he died. As a cruel twist of fate, he rose as a ghost but was eternally bound to the place of his death. In 1486 DR, Sorlan was still waiting for some end to his torments.
